definition[0]: a book or list of names, facts etc, usually arranged in alphabetical order
example[0]: I couldn’t find your number in the telephone directory.
definition[1]: a place in a computer where files or programs are organized
example[2]: the Classified Directory of Wisconsin Manufacturers
definition[2]: part of a computer’s memory where information is stored, containing one or more FILEs
example[3]: I suggest you create a separate directory to keep these files in.
